name: ToTheShape
description:
A project developed for geo jam, in which we move forward by our character, which consists of geometric shapes, we must to go through the doors that appear in front of us which is have one correct and one wrong shape on it, to the correct side, the shape of the character changes as we progress and the game accelerates.

Game developer brothers living in Turkey.

Olcay ÇİFTÇİ

Alican ÇİFTÇİ
